Service Details: - Provides support for clients seeking employment, skills development, and upgrading- Aims to meet the Aboriginal Skills and Employment Training Strategy by being both client and employer-driven- Networks with employers to optimize opportunities to attract, retain, and develop careers for urban-Aboriginal peoples in the Kelowna area- Collaborates with UBCO and Okanagan College each year to offer an Aboriginal Career Fair, which provides an opportunity for area youth to connect with potential employers, post-secondary educational opportunities, and to explore career options
Address & Map: 442 Leon AveKelowna, BC     V1Y 6J3View MapQuest Map
